reviews.text: In the winter months,  they build a small skating area for public skates.  Great spot for little family picnics,  no8 BBQ'S.  They host events throughout the year, especially Summertime. Canada Day, Harvest festival and outdoor theater and other activities. Bring you own lawnchair for outdoor entertainment. Visit the Officers Museum for a small fee. Popular place for mini photo shoots, there are public washrooms on site.  In the downtown core and handy to local coffee shops, food establishments and shopping. Under some renovations to upgrade the outdoor space.
Interesting space. We liked the walking bridge and lighthouse. Enjoyed viewing the old buildings and park. Shaded areas are appreciated when it’s very hot.
So much fun!  Always something fun to do here with the family.   ❤
Beautiful location lots of outdoor shows all year round great family fun

The beauty of officers square is its history, and the fact it allows locals a gathering spot to relax and mingle amongst each other. I’ve always admired to old history to the square, it’s statues and old iron fencing. It’s sad to see a portion of the fence be removed, but the park still has it’s beautiful old trees, and it’s rustic comfort.

I’d love for Fredericton to provide more local gathering spots like this, it’s a great place to meet people, relax after work/dinner, and view events.

Visited this place during a school field trip to my then elementary school child. Beautiful place. With lots of history. It was during the springtime and their were so many beautiful places to take pictures. All I can remember
My cousin got married here. It's a very traditional building. Nice for a small wedding or gathering.  My cousin loved it, and we had the time of our lives.
Very nice venue we visited for a friend's wedding, it was decorated for the holidays. A great historic venue
Love visiting Santa here!
Beautiful Wedding

Sunshine diner lives up to its name! Friendly staff, home cooked meals and fresh coffee! 
My 3-egg veggie omelette looked so good when it came to the table I didnt have time to take a photo! 
I always love a good breakfast joint that has flavorful, authentic, and local foods and this place has it all.

Homecooking, casual dining, and friendly, warm service. Sunshine is a traditional greasy spoon and a favorite breakfast and brunch spot for locals who keep it simple. Personal favorite menu item: The Really Big Breakfast!
Old-style diner with counter seating as well as tables and booths and get your own coffee and drinks. Staff are friendly and accommodating. Great breakfasts.
Good food, good price. Bottomless coffee is great

Breakfast is fair price and standard. As with most diners you smell onion-you when you leave. Busy place though on Saturday mornings but fairly quick so no long waits. I don't know if the service was slow or if the wait staff saw that we were there for a meeting as well so left us alone. Other tables moved pretty quickly so I'm leaning towards that.

We have been here numerous times and love it every time! Staff is wicked, and probably the best food in town, I had a steak which I typically do not get at a restaurant because I am usually disappointed, not at brewbakers! Probably the best steak I have ever eaten!

Great spot. Dined on the special which was a crab pasta dish and also the seared Pork tenderloin. Staff was attentive and friendly. Food was remarkably splendid in taste. The pork was cooked perfectly. A definite hit and will be back.

Great restaurant in the downtown of Fredericton. They have delicious food, a good selection of alcoholic beverages and a great ambiance. I would strongly recommend this place for dates, get togethers or professional outings.
Very beautiful pub. A great place to just have a very good meal and relax. Would highly recommend it.
Great food great service. Celebrated birthday and did not regret choosing BrewBakers.
Beautiful sunny day ditting outside. Food wondrrful great service. 😊

Amazing food, plating presentation. Yummy homemade ice creams/dessert!
Don't miss to prebook and visit the restaurant.
Lovely food very nice place and staff singing was great haha 😂

Enjoyable place to experience if you are in Adare Village. Eryn was accommodating to my party of six and she was so friendly. We enjoyed our meal as it was cooked perfectly. Thanks so much for the amazing service and food. We left very happy 😍
Just stopped for lunch on way to Killarney.. delightful little restaurant..beautiful food.. lovely staff..well worth the stop.

Always enjoy eating here. One of Fredericton's local favorites.

Awesome warm and friendly atmosphere, fun staff, good local beer selection, and  really great pub fare / comfort food menu.

Overall, a great place to go out for a casual and relaxed dinner or evening meal. Oh, and a great deal on Wednesdays when apps are half price (remember to buy a drink)!

Everything about Snooty warms my heart. The staff are always amazing and friendly. Lots of good beer. They have an upper deck patio in the warmer months and a side room that comfortably fits up to 20 of your homies (I requested said room for my birthday and crammed 20+ in there and it was awesome!) Do yourself a favour and order some Duke Rolls while you're visiting!

A popular pub located in the heart of downtown Fredericton, the Snooty Fox has a reputation for being a great social hangout. If the weather is good you can sit on the roof level of the establishment which is the best choice in the summer. If visiting from out of New Brunswick I recommend trying some of the local brews they offer. Picaroons is always a good choice.
My third  time coming here, and always a good experience. Good food,  good service, and great local beer taps. Always a fun and friendly crowd. A must visit if in Fredericton!
We were a group of 25, and got served fairly quickly. Friendly staff. Good choices on tap.

Always a favorite of mine when I need a good hit of Chinese food. I really enjoy the peeled shrimp and adding them to the chowder. Other classics are available such as the salad buffet and a nice assortment of Chinese dishes to either order or select from the buffet area. Finish off the meal with several dessert choices. Can't go wrong here - great servers as well 😀🍴👍

Came here for the first time for the buffet. Pretty good food. The quality is top notch. They keep the food stocked. The mussels are really soft and well cooked. The beef with broccoli is very tender. The chicken balls have a lot of chicken and minimal breading which is rare to see in Chinese buffets. The soups and salads are well made and taste fresh.

The staff were extremely friendly and accommodating. I would definitely visit again.
My time here was wonderful. The seafood buffet was spectacular, staff was nice.  Overall, best chinese food I’ve ever had.  And 24 hours!
Dinner buffet was excellent, decent selection and fairly priced.  Chicken wings were so crispy! Highly recommended.  I've had breakfast here as well and it is excellent, great portions.

Been here before but this visit was the first in a few years. The Chinese combo plate was perhaps one of the most bland dishes I've ever had. The food was hot and service was friendly and such however, the food was quite simply, tasteless. The buffet looked enticing and was quite popular on this evening and perhaps I should have tried it instead. Past experiences here have been pretty good but tonight was a bit of a disappointment.

After coming here a couple of times shortly after they opened and being very disappointed, I went back and was pleasantly surprised. The menu has been updated with lower, more reasonable prices and better pizza options. The beer that they brew in-house is good too. I really liked the IPA, which is fairly bitter and seems to be more of a west coast style. All of the appetizers I tried were good; my only complaint is that the hush puppies and the toasted bread that came with my pork belly were a bit overdone. The pizza I had was absolutely delicious.
The atmosphere is great too. Service was a bit on the slow side but it was also very busy. The improvements they've made since opening are impressive and I'll definitely be returning.

Really enjoyed our time here.  Heard that it was struggling at first. But with some changes to management, it seems to be doing well now.

I tried several of their appetizers. The one that stood out was the nachos.  It really captured that smokey taste from the wood fired oven.

The decor and look of the restaurant is great. Our service was decent and the food was quite good, however it was EXTREMELY loud inside. It made it difficult to enjoy our meal and conversation.  They’ve opened things up too much. I would go back for patio weather but probably not back inside.

My wife and I went to this restaurant tonight. Great spot. Great atmosphere. Started with the spinach dip platter (great for sharing) I had the flank steak and my wife had one of the wood fire oven pizzas. Great presentation. Had some churros for dessert. Great meal. Saw other meals and apps go by that looked pretty delicious as well. Not sure if there is a bad choice. Also, they make their own beer on site 😀🍻😀

First time. Loved it! Wonderful atmosphere and deco. Food was delicious & excellent service! The following  may seem trivial but I am a former server so these things stuck out: they have excellent napkins, an extra awesome touch with the bill (I'll leave that for you to discover), the chalk boards were clean and writing was on point, and,finally, the upstairs is fantastic with huge booths, easily seating larger parties. I will be back!
One of the best domains I've had. Really nice tzatziki sauce. They delivered really fast too.

Anywhere that charges extra to get donair sauce with garlic fingers should get a reality check because nowhere else charges for donair sauce they just include it mandatory donair sauce with garlic fingers right up in the box like it should be but nope they want 2$ for a large cup of donair sauce after the ridiculous price of a 12 inch garlic finger with bacon bits.... Nope. Garbage.
ME & MY BOYS LOVE FADI'S!!! SO CHEAP AND TASTY. GIVE U TONS OF FOOD FOR THE PRICE. EXCELLENT SERVICE. GOOD ENOUGH TO MAKE US ALL REGULARS THANK YOU BASED FADI'S
Tony and Fadi and staff are always so friendly.  Food is incredible  here. Highly recommend!!
My whole family loves to eat here. Very friendly service and the food is fantastic!
Great Ambiance. Really good food. Went for the breakfast buffet and they had a lot of good choices. They even have gluten free options as well.

Went for wedding reception. Things where good, not great. Table with bride, groom and wedding party served last. Seemed to serve one table at a time. When the head table was served, most others where finished. Adding one additional server may have helped.

I travel a great deal and I have had breakfast at my fair share of hotel restaurants,  I have to say that this one in particular was very good.  I would most definitely recommend this place for anyone staying at this hotel.
Excellent food and the prices reflect that, it is a little pricey but well worth it if you enjoy fine dining. The service is excellent as you would expect from an upscale restaurant.
Went for weekend breakfast; good variety--hot & cold,  unlimited coffee, etc.; Staff is friendly,.

Always a favorite of mine when I need a good hit of Chinese food. I really enjoy the peeled shrimp and adding them to the chowder. Other classics are available such as the salad buffet and a nice assortment of Chinese dishes to either order or select from the buffet area. Finish off the meal with several dessert choices. Can't go wrong here - great servers as well 😀🍴👍

Came here for the first time for the buffet. Pretty good food. The quality is top notch. They keep the food stocked. The mussels are really soft and well cooked. The beef with broccoli is very tender. The chicken balls have a lot of chicken and minimal breading which is rare to see in Chinese buffets. The soups and salads are well made and taste fresh.

The staff were extremely friendly and accommodating. I would definitely visit again.
My time here was wonderful. The seafood buffet was spectacular, staff was nice.  Overall, best chinese food I’ve ever had.  And 24 hours!
Dinner buffet was excellent, decent selection and fairly priced.  Chicken wings were so crispy! Highly recommended.  I've had breakfast here as well and it is excellent, great portions.

Been here before but this visit was the first in a few years. The Chinese combo plate was perhaps one of the most bland dishes I've ever had. The food was hot and service was friendly and such however, the food was quite simply, tasteless. The buffet looked enticing and was quite popular on this evening and perhaps I should have tried it instead. Past experiences here have been pretty good but tonight was a bit of a disappointment.

Carribean Flavas have to be one of my favourite restaurants in Freddy!  Great family atmosphere and food is delicious!  Thanks for sharing your love and passion through food. 
Dawn

It was delicious and I liked the atmosphere but it was over priced. It didn't seem kid friendly even though it has a kids menu. A tiny pizza and seriously 6 fries cost $10.99 for my kid! No drink or anything included. 

Small portions for the price.

Owner and staff were very nice.

A suggestion would be to lower the price of the kids meal and have crayons and paper available for the kids so that the parents can enjoy their time.
Absolutely perfect! We were received as if we were guests in someone's home!  Flavors flavors flavors!! Amazing authentic food served up fresh by passionate real people! Thanks so much Chef Naz! 🙏🙏🙏

Spicy means spicy. We were on a stop in town on a long trip in Canada and we were not disappointed by this nice restaurant. The owners really care about their guests. The food was very tasty and, well spicy. I can recommend this restaurant very much.

Not very good customer service, I went in to eat about half a year ago. I was seated and made my drink order, but my drinks didn't arrive within 10 minutes and I never got to make my order for food, so I just left. Hopefully it's better now, but at the moment I have poor faith in this establishment.
The Buffett was so much better than Jubilee.Lunch Buffett was $15.
Food was good.  Price fair.  But it was so cold in the restaurant it is unlikely I will go back unless its summer!

Very friendly and efficient service however, food is not as good as it once was. Meat used in recipes was of an especially disappointing quality.  This is the first time I had a bad experience here. I'll go back in a few weeks and give it another try
Order a meal for two. The dishes came out one at a time. Like all dishes delivered so you can enjoy together. Not pleased to slow!

Used to go frequently, haven't been in awhile so tried tonight. Won't be going back. I don't mind paying $$ for a buffet but every thing on the buffet was horrible. As well, "dessert"was dry squares and crystally ice cream. To top it off we were shivering the whole time there very dissapointing

Amazing food and very accommodating.

My family has been coming here everytime we drive in to visit my sister. 
We have always been served with excellence and efficacy. My mom has sensitivity to loud sounds (speakers or drink stations) and the staff is very understanding with finding us a quiet table.
The food has, by far, the best yellow curry. 
I have never had tamarind stir fry before and I have high expectations of other restaurants who also serve that now.
10/10

One of my favourite restaurants in Fredericton. Authentic Vietnamese pho that is simmered for hours to deliver a rich and full flavour. Sauce options are second to none and the lunch special is extremely reasonable.

Really enjoy the food here, staff are a fun group that make you feel welcome. Lots of variety on the menu that would work for all palates! Lots of free parking, very resonreaso prices. Highly recommended!!!
Delightfully surprised! Delicious food, wonderful staff.  Really nice place for some Thai food.
Enjoyed the food and the service. I don't know a lot about Vietnamese food, but I hear it's authentic, and I've enjoyed every dish I've tried.

Still the best Bloody Mary I have ever had.   I stop in every time I’m in Carbondale.  I have had too many good evenings with friends in the cellar to even begin to count.  Many Friday nights started at The Cellar.
Nice low key joint with great drinks!
Neat spot and have a good selection of drinks.
It's a fun old style bar that's down a long flight of stairs. Great drinks! Fun staff!

Possibly my favorite bar in Carbondale. Just a classic basement bar with a hometown feel. There seems to be a bunch of eccentric characters like you would find in an episode of Cheers. Staff were really friendly and helpful. I can't wait to go back there again. Also, pretty easy to find parking and drinks are inexpensive.

Always enjoy eating here. One of Fredericton's local favorites.

Awesome warm and friendly atmosphere, fun staff, good local beer selection, and  really great pub fare / comfort food menu.

Overall, a great place to go out for a casual and relaxed dinner or evening meal. Oh, and a great deal on Wednesdays when apps are half price (remember to buy a drink)!

Everything about Snooty warms my heart. The staff are always amazing and friendly. Lots of good beer. They have an upper deck patio in the warmer months and a side room that comfortably fits up to 20 of your homies (I requested said room for my birthday and crammed 20+ in there and it was awesome!) Do yourself a favour and order some Duke Rolls while you're visiting!

A popular pub located in the heart of downtown Fredericton, the Snooty Fox has a reputation for being a great social hangout. If the weather is good you can sit on the roof level of the establishment which is the best choice in the summer. If visiting from out of New Brunswick I recommend trying some of the local brews they offer. Picaroons is always a good choice.
My third  time coming here, and always a good experience. Good food,  good service, and great local beer taps. Always a fun and friendly crowd. A must visit if in Fredericton!
We were a group of 25, and got served fairly quickly. Friendly staff. Good choices on tap.
